name: Paku (Leevi2000)
description:
Your job is to load and deliver packages between factories. The dice decide where you must go.

This game was made during GMTK Game Jam 2022 as my solo project.  Jam lasted for 50 hours. All the art and music/sounds are made by me. 

If you get stuck, remember there's a reverse gear. You can only change to/from reverse gear when the vehicle is stationary.

You can use the project files how you like. Github repository of this game is a mess, so good luck in there.
